in.teramatrix.flint.driver.controller

Class ApiManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.controller.ApiManager

  • public class ApiManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class will setup a ContinuousTouchListener on the provided View. If this happens, an AlertDialog will open to getString password, If password is correct the another AlertDialog will open to getString url of APIs. If Url is validated this class will broadcast through BroadcastReceiver
    Author:
    Mohsin Khan
    Date:
    15 Feb 2016

      private static java.lang.String PASSWORD

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Method will setup a listener to the view which is passed in arguments. If user touches continuously on this view, An AlertDialog will open to setup app settings.
        See Also:
        ContinuousTouchListener

      • openDialog

        private void openDialog(java.lang.String hint,
                        java.lang.String button)
        This will construct An AlertDialog with some custom views.
        Parameters:
        hint - to be shown as hint in AppCompatEditText
        button - it is positive button label
